name: Fight For the Night
description:
Fight for The Night is a third-person, competitive multiplayer tower defence game.  Confined on a sound-stage on Halloween night, you will play as one of the epitomes of horror from B-Grade movies of old.

You'll duke it out with an opponent to fight for the title of Scariest Monster on Halloween Night. But it won't be easy, you will have protect your throne from the enemy forces by building and upgrading powerful towers and use devastating abilities, so that you may overcome your opponent with your army of vile minions.
